info.title: Events API Specification - ASPSP Endpoints
info.description: OpenAPI for Events (Subscription & Aggregated Polling) API Specification - ASPSP Endpoints

parameters.name: x-fapi-auth-date
parameters.description:
The time when the PSU last logged in with the TPP. 
All dates in the HTTP headers are represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates. An example is below: 
Sun, 10 Sep 2017 19:43:31 GMT+03:00

parameters.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
parameters.description: The PSU's IP address if the PSU is currently logged in with the TPP.

parameters.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
parameters.description: An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.

parameters.name: Authorisation
parameters.description: An Authorisation Token as per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750

parameters.name: x-customer-user-agent
parameters.description: Indicates the user-agent that the PSU is using.

x-fapi-interaction-id.description: An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.

x-jws-signature.description: Header containing a detached JWS signature of the body of the payload.

ISODateTime.description:
All dates in the JSON payloads are represented in ISO 8601 date-time format. 
All date-time fields in responses must include the timezone. An example is below:
2017-04-05T10:43:07+03:00

Meta.title: MetaData
Meta.description: Meta Data relevant to the payload

ErrorCode.description: Low level textual error code, e.g., BH.OBF.Field.Missing

Message.description:
A description of the error that occurred. e.g., 'A mandatory field isn't supplied' or 'RequestedExecutionDateTime must be in future'
OBIE doesn't standardise this field

Path.description: Recommended but optional reference to the JSON Path of the field with error, e.g., Data.Initiation.InstructedAmount.Currency

Url.description: URL to help remediate the problem, or provide more information, or to API Reference, or help etc

Code.description: High level textual error code, to help categorize the errors.

Id.description: A unique reference for the error instance, for audit purposes, in case of unknown/unclassified errors.

Message.description: Brief Error message, e.g., 'There is something wrong with the request parameters provided'

OBErrorResponse.description: An array of detail error codes, and messages, and URLs to documentation to help remediation.

maxEvents.description: Maximum number of events to be returned. A value of zero indicates the ASPSP should not return events even if available

returnImmediately.description: Indicates whether an ASPSP should return a response immediately or provide a long poll

items.description: An array of jti values indicating event notifications positively acknowledged by the TPP

setErrs.description: An object that encapsulates all negative acknowledgements transmitted by the TPP

moreAvailable.description: A JSON boolean value that indicates if more unacknowledged event notifications are available to be returned.

additionalProperties.description:
"An object named with the jti\_of the\_event notification to be delivered. The value is the event notification, 
expressed as a\_string.\nThe payload of the event should be defined in the OBEventNotification\_format."

sets.description:
'A JSON object that contains zero or more nested JSON attributes. If there are no outstanding event notifications to be transmitted, 
the JSON object SHALL be empty.'

CallbackUrl.description: Callback URL for a TPP hosted service. Will be used by ASPSPs, in conjunction with the resource name, to construct a URL to send event notifications to.

items.description: Array of event types the subscription applies to.

EventSubscriptionId.description: Unique identification as assigned by the ASPSP to uniquely identify the callback URL resource.

CallbackUrl.description: Callback URL for a TPP hosted service. Will be used by ASPSPs, in conjunction with the resource name, to construct a URL to send event notifications to.

items.description: Array of event types the subscription applies to.

EventSubscriptionId.description: Unique identification as assigned by the ASPSP to uniquely identify the callback url resource.

CallbackUrl.description:
'Callback URL for a TPP hosted service. Will be used by ASPSPs, in conjunction with the resource name, 
to construct a URL to send event notifications to.'

items.description: Array of event types the subscription applies to.

err.description:
A value from the IANA "Security Event Token Delivery Error Codes" registry that identifies the error as defined here 
https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-ietf-secevent-http-push-03.html#error_codes

description.description: A human-readable string that provides additional diagnostic information

x-idempotency-key.name: x-idempotency-key
x-idempotency-key.description:
Every request will be processed only once per x-idempotency-key.  The
Idempotency Key will be valid for 24 hours.

x-jws-signature.name: x-jws-signature
x-jws-signature.description: A detached JWS signature of the body of the payload.

TPPOAuth2Security.description: TPP client credential authorisation flow with the ASPSP

scopes.accounts: Ability to receive events associated with Accounts information
scopes.fundsconfirmations: Ability to receive events associated with confirmation of funds
scopes.payments: Ability to receieve events associated with payments
